name: Docking Clamps
description: You may dock up to 4 TIE fighters, TIE Interceptors, TIE Bombers, or TIE Advanced to this ship. All these ships must be of the same type.

name: Expanded Cargo Hold
description: Once per round, when you would be dealt a faceup Damage card, you may draw that card from either the fore or aft Damage deck.

name: Broadcast Array
description: Your action bar gains the {jam} action icon.

name: Backup Shield Generator
description: At the end of each round, you may spend 1 energy to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value). Limited.

name: EM Emitter
description: When you obstruct an attack, the defender rolls 3 additional defense dice (instead of 1). Limited.

name: Engine Booster
description: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver dial, you may spend 1 energy to execute a white 1 {forward} maneuver. You cannot use this ability if you would overlap another ship. Limited.

name: Cluster Bombs
description: After defending, you may discard this card. If you do, each other ship at Range 1 of the defending section rolls 2 attack dice, suffering all damage ({hit}) and critical damage ({critical}) rolled.

name: Comms Booster
description: Energy: Spend 1 energy to remove all stress tokens from a friendly ship at Range 1-3. Then assign 1 focus token to that ship.

name: Frequency Jammer
description: When you perform a jam action, choose 1 enemy ship that does not have a stress token and is at Range 1 of the jammed ship. The chosen ship receives 1 stress token. Limited.

name: Ionization Reactor
description: Energy: Spend 5 energy from this card and discard this card to cause each other ship at Range 1 to suffer 1 damage and receive 1 ion token. Limited.

name: Shield Projector
description: When an enemy ship is declaring either a small or large ship as the target of its attack, you may spend 3 energy to force that ship to target you if possible.

name: Tibanna Gas Supplies
description: You may discard this card to gain 3 energy. Limited.

name: Slicer Tools
description: Action: Choose 1 or more enemy ships at Range 1-3 that have a stress token. For each ship chosen, you may spend 1 energy to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.
